title: MDBX_MAP_FULL: Environment mapsize limit reached
body:
#### System information

docker thorax/erigon:v2.47.0
OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX

Commit hash: 

Erigon Command (with flags/config):
```

                "--txpool.disable",
                "--bor.heimdall=http://127.0.0.1:1317",
                "--rpc.gascap",
                "500000000",
                "--chain",
                "bor-mainnet",
                "--metrics",
                "--rpc.returndata.limit=999999999",
                "--rpc.batch.limit=2000",
                "--metrics.addr",
                "192.168.0.16",
                "--metrics.port",

                "--datadir",
                "/data",

                "--http.api=eth,erigon,web3,net,debug,trace,txpool",
                "--http.addr",
                "192.168.0.16",
                "--http.port",
                "8545",
                "--http.vhosts",
                "*",
                "--ws",

            ],
```
Concensus Layer:
